# Get Started Docs

> Documentation for Get Started Docs.

- [Get started with semantic analysis](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/get-started/semantic-analysis.md): This tutorial provides an overview of working with semantic analysis using the .NET Compiler SDK.
- [Get started with syntax analysis (Roslyn APIs)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/get-started/syntax-analysis.md): An introduction to traversing, querying, and walking syntax trees.
- [Get started with syntax transformation (Roslyn APIs)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/roslyn-sdk/get-started/syntax-transformation.md): An introduction to creating and transforming syntax trees.
